English தமிழ் Kisan Call Center :: 1800-180-1551 (from any Landline or Mobile) / 1551 (from BSNL Landline) The Department of Agriculture & Cooperation (DAC), Ministry of Agriculture, Govt. of India launched Kisan Call Centers on January 21, 2004 across the country to deliver extension services to the farming community.
